attributes.action: Allow students to claim refunds on loans for cancelled or lectures being short.
attributes.background: Students should be allowed to claim refunds on students loans, if lectures are cancelled or always cut short. Students spend £9000 a year for so many lectures to be cancelled or lecturers to not actually take a lecture. I don't pay the loan to spend 45 minutes sitting in a room then leaving.

rejection.details: The decision to refund student tuition fees would be responsibility of universities, rather than the UK Government or Parliament.
